title: Freie Universität Berlin- Freundschaft Suchen!!
body:
((Mein Deutsch ist nicht so gut deshalb schreibe ich auf Englisch, sorry!))

Hello everyone, I'm new to Berlin and just started my study in FU.
I would love to look for anyone who plays League and able to meet up sometimes and play together!
Of course it doesn't really matter if you are not studying in FU,
but I really want to make new friends in Berlin who love to play league with me!
Being in a new environment and have no friends suck :(
(I would love to watch the worlds together too!)

For my background info:
I'm from Hong Kong and 22.
I speak fluent English,Chinese, Cantonese and some German.
I'm female but please don't judge me for that coz I'm a gamer!!
Feel free to add me in game.
See you around!!

replies.body:
{{champion:1}} 
Thanks for those who added me and played with me
I'm so happy to meet you all!
Have a nice weekend!

Hi, what are your fields of study?
Are you in the house at Steglitz or in Dahlem?

Hello, I study Nordamerikastudien and I am living in Tempelhof :) 
What about you?

I study at the FU, but living in Potsdam.
My mainfield is dramatics (Theaterwissenschaft). Im not this often in Berlin in my freetime after studying.

I've sent you a friend request. :)

Hey I`m new in Berlin too. (doing an internship atm, staying at least till 31th dez but maybe untill next summer)  And yeah I dont really have many friends here too ^^ 

Some Infos about me:
- I'm 18 y/o
- my english is pretty ok I guess ;p
- I love LoL (not too much time to play it atm sadly :/)
- doing an internship in online marketing right now

I wouldnt be open to watch the finals togeter tho because a good friend comes to Berlin and we visit a german Public Viewing Event called "The Main"

If you are interested, just awnser here or add me in LoL (just a ward)
cool  ! I will add you when I'm home :) have fun in the event, we could meet up sometimes if you want.
Just do a cosplay walk around in berlin and you will have so many friends....jk the only thing you will get is some ppl will ,,look at you" and call the police....gg. Welcome to germany !
LOL not really into the cosplay stuff but I wouldnt mind if I know anyone who does that.... saw couples of them in München though.

Hey im not from Berlin but u didnt got that many answers 
so if you want somebody to play league with add me ^^ 
see ya at the rift Kvothe100 (Lennard)

Hey Lennard, it's so nice of you to reply me :D
i will add you when I'm Home
Welcome in Germany! I hope you enjoy your time here :)

Germany is great,I love it:)
so you are in New Zealand  or Germany?
If you want to know a bit about Berlin, you can add me.
sure! thanks, I have added you

Im not from Berlin but i wish you good luck finding new friends to meet irl ^.^
Saw this post so i tought just comment on it.

thank you :)
it's actually a bit hard though haha
